title: Krop logo font, it's a nice script font
content:
Hi

anyone know this script font?  
don't look at "creative database" \*

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120502155332im_/http:/typophile.com/files/krop-creative-database-logo_6449.gif)

\*if you don't know, "creative database" is in Myriad Pro
author: matt89fe

comments.content:
Reminds me of the font used on Sharpie markers.

Peace,  
JT
